abstract: Police in Netherlands arrest young man with fake weapon who had threatened workers at television studio of national broadcaster NOS.
lead_paragraph: A 19-year-old Dutchman with a pistol forced his way into the studios of the national broadcaster NOS on Thursday demanding to be allowed to go on air, but he was quickly arrested, officials said.
snippet: A 19-year-old Dutchman with a pistol forced his way into the studios of the national broadcaster NOS on Thursday demanding to be allowed to go on air, but he was quickly arrested, officials said.

headline.main: The Netherlands: Intruder Arrested at TV Broadcaster
headline.print_headline: The Netherlands: Intruder Arrested at TV Broadcaster
